title: Alignment
pickOne: **Chaotic** - Free someone from literal or figurative bonds.
**Good** - Endanger yourself to combat an unnatural threat.
**Neutral** - Help an animal or spirit of the wild.

title: Race
pick: Elf - When you **Undertake A Perilous Journey** through wilderness whatever job you take you suceed as if you rolled a 10+.
Human - When you **Make Camp** in a dungeon or city, you don't need to consume a ration.

title: Animal Companion
description: You have a supernatural connection with a loyal animal. You can't talk to it per se but it always acts as you wish it to.

title: Hunt & Track (+WIS)
description: When you **follow a trail of clues left behind by passing creatures**, roll+WIS.

outcomes.text: You follow the creature's trail until there's a significant change in its direction or mode of travel, and choose 1:
bullets: Gain a useful bit of information about your quarry, the GM will tell you what
Determine what caused the trail to end

outcomes.text: You follow the creature's trail until there's a significant change in its direction or mode of travel.

title: Called Shot
description: When you **attack a defenseless or surprised enemy at range**, you can choose to deal your damage or name your target and roll+DEX.

outcomes.text: They do nothing but stand and drool for a few moments.

title: Command
description: When you **work with your animal companion on something it's trained in**:

bullets: and you attack the same target, add its *ferocity* to your damage
and you track, add its *cunning* to your roll
and you take damage, add its *armor* to your *armor*
and you **Discern Realities**, add its *cunning* to your roll
and you **Parley**, add its *cunning* to your roll
and someone Interferes with you, add its *instinct* to their roll

title: Half-elven
description: Somewhere in your lineage lies mixed blood and it begins to show its presence. You gain the elf starting move if you took the human one at character creation or vice versa. **You may take this move only if it is your first advancement**.

title: Wild Empathy
description: You can speak with and understand animals.

title: Familiar Prey
description: When you **Spout Lore** **about a monster** you use WIS instead of INT.

title: Viper's Strike
description: When you **strike an enemy with two weapons at once**, add an extra 1d4 damage for your off-hand strike.

title: Camouflage
description: When you **keep still in natural surroundings**, enemies never spot you until you make a movement.

title: Man's Best Friend
description: When you **allow your animal companion to take a blow that was meant for you**, the damage is negated and your animal companion's ferocity becomes 0. If its ferocity is already 0 you can't use this ability. When you have a few hours of rest with your animal companion its ferocity returns to normal.

title: Blot Out The Sun
description: When you **Volley** you may spend extra ammo before rolling. For each point of ammo spent you may choose an extra target. Roll once and apply damage to all targets.

title: Well-trained
description: Choose another training for your animal companion.

title: God Amidst The Wastes
description: Dedicate yourself to a deity (name a new one or choose one that's already been established). You gain the commune and cast a spell cleric moves. When you select this move, treat yourself as a cleric of level 1 for using spells. Every time you gain a level thereafter, increase your effective cleric level by 1.

title: Follow Me
description: When you **Undertake A Perilous Journey** you can take two roles. You make a separate roll for each.

title: A Safe Place
description: When you **set the watch for the night**, everyone takes +1 to **Take Watch**.

title: Wild Speech (Requires level 6+)
description:
Replaces: **Wild Empathy**

You can speak with and understand any non-magical, non-planar creature.

title: Hunter's Prey (Requires level 6+)
description:
Replaces: **Familiar Prey**

When you **Spout Lore** about a monster you use WIS instead of INT. On a 12+, in addition to the normal effects, you get to ask the GM any one question about the subject.

title: Viper's Fangs (Requires level 6+)
description:
Replaces: **Viper's Strike**

When you **strike an enemy with two weapons at once**, add an extra 1d8 damage for your off-hand strike.

title: Smaug's Belly (Requires level 6+)
description: When you **know your target's weakest point** your arrows have 2 piercing.

title: Strider (Requires level 6+)
description:
Replaces: **Follow Me**

When you **Undertake A Perilous Journey** you can take two roles. Roll twice and use the better result for both roles.

title: A Safer Place (Requires level 6+)
description:
Replaces: **A Safe Place**

When you **set the watch for the night**, everyone takes +1 to **Take Watch**. After a night in camp when you set the watch everyone takes **+1 forward**.

title: Observant (Requires level 6+)
description: When you **hunt and track**, on a hit you may also ask one question about the creature you are tracking from the **Discern Realities** list for free.

title: Special Trick (Requires level 6+)
description: Choose a move from another class. So long as you are working with your animal companion you have access to that move.

title: Unnatural Ally (Requires level 6+)
description: Your animal companion is a monster, not an animal. Describe it. Give it +2 ferocity and +1 instinct, plus a new training.
